content.rendered:
Vmaxinfo Instituteoffers professional level Software Testing Diploma course catering to career development and working professionals. We offer 3 Months Diploma course as well as short term modular courses. We have the option of Regular course and weekend batched. We also prepare students for ISTQB certification. We provide placement assistance for students after completion of the course and have a good track record of placement. Also, we have a 100% record of passing ISTQB exam in the first attempt.

Software Testing Course Training Institute in Pune

There are many institutes for Software course in Pune. But Vmaxinfo Instituteis the best Software Testing training institute in Pune. As Vmaxinfo Instituteprovide diploma course with manual testing and automation testing, students get complete knowledge of Software Testing. Therefore they can develop their career as a Software Tester in IT industries. Below are details of the course.

Diploma in Software Testing

Manual Software Testing

Duration

2 months

Why Our Software Testing course is the best among all other institutes in Pune?

  • Job oriented training
  • Resume Building
  • ISTQB Certification preparation.
  • Domain knowledge of Shopping Application, ERP Application, Mobile Application
  • Hands on experience with Live Project
  • A wide range of scope in the market
  • Placement Assistance

Course Content

  • Software Testing Introduction
  • SDLC& STLC
  • Types of Testing
  • Software Testing Life Cycle
  • Test Cases &Test Plan
  • Quality Control
  • Performance testing with JMeter
  • Open Source Project
  • Build & Release Bug Life Cycle Defect Tracking
  • Test Data Management Client—Server Test Open Source Project
  • Live Application /Open Source Project
  • Test management tool
  • Defect tracking tools
  • Deriving Test Cases from Use cases
  • Test Case Design Techniques
  • Write/Review/Execution of Test Cases
  • Logging defects and Summary Reports
  • Writing of Testplan And Test effort estimation
  • Interview Questions and more.

ISTQB Preparation

  • Fundamentals of software testing
  • Testing throughout the software lifecycle
  • Static Testing
  • Test Design techniques
  • Test Management
  • Tool support for testing
  • Calculations of CC(Cyclomatic Complexity)
  • Statement Coverage
  • Branch Coverage
  • Decision Coverage and the relationship between them
  • Exam Preparation
  • Solving Q/A based on topics

Know about Automation Testing

Best Software Testing Course in Pune

Vmaxinfo Instituteis best training institute for Software Testing Course in Pune. Vmaxinfo Instituteoffer practical oriented training with lot of practical and industrial example. Vmaxinfo Instituteoffer Diploma Course which cover Manual Testing and Automation Testing as well with Selenium WebDriver and Test NG. For details contact to the institute.
